devdoc.details: Methods assume a deterministic generation of URI based on token IDs.      Methods also assume that URI uses hex representation of token IDs.

params._interfaceID: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165

uri(uint256).details: URIs are defined in RFC 3986.      URIs are assumed to be deterministically generated based on token ID

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Query if a contract implements an interface

uri(uint256).notice: A distinct Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for a given token.

userdoc.notice: Contract that handles metadata related methods.
